plot: Mischak Machur is a satiric comedy, planned as a "game-show". Einav Galili, Guri Alfi, Lior Shlein and other guests discuss in a humorous way about the events of the past week.
plot_en: Mischak Machur is a satiric comedy, planned as a "game-show". Einav Galili, Guri Alfi, Lior Shlein and other guests discuss in a humorous way about the events of the past week.
plot_es: Mischak Machur is a satiric comedy, planned as a "game-show". Einav Galili, Guri Alfi, Lior Shlein and other guests discuss in a humorous way about the events of the past week.
title: Mischak Machur
